name: Sneak Guy
description:
Sneak your way through the castle at the behest of the mysterious voice.

Important Note! : If you find the game is running at 2x speed, or crashes when attempting to make full screen, this is because you have a graphics card that is different than the program expects. Sadly, this is not something I can fix. If this occurs, please go into the options.ini file and set "Alternate Synchronization" to 0. This should fix the speed.
